QuestData.Title: Ogre Ancestry
QuestData.Description: Lunk no like fight, want to learn. You help Lunk learn?$B$BFind Lunk ancestors. Lunk have many question. Where Lunk come from? Why Lunk Lunk?$B$BLunk stay here. Small ogres mean, big ogres meaner.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect an Ogre Family Tree from the Bloodmaul Slag Mines.
QuestData.RewardText: Lunk know you kill many ogre for this, and Lunk very upset about this, but Lunk also still grateful.$B$BWait, dis not Lunk family club...
